knimeNode.name: MediaWiki exists
knimeNode.shortDescription: Tests if a page exists in MediaWiki

fullDescription.intro:
Mediawiki is the popular wiki platform used by Wikipedia. This node tests whether an article in a mediawiki installation exists and appends the boolean value to the table. Hence, this node can be used to quickly tell a user if a gene has already been annotated by a colleague.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
